The Congressional Budget Office‚Äôs preliminary score estimates that The Lower Drug Costs Now Act will reduce federal direct spending for Medicare by $345 billion from 2023-2029.

Seniors are disproportionately affected by the sky-high prescription drug prices they are forced to pay.  #HR3 directly helps our seniors by capping their out-of-pocket drug costs AND it limits costs for individuals in employer sponsored plans and commercial health insurance.

1 vial of insulin in the US shouldn‚Äôt cost 10x what it does in Canada. #HR3 stops drug companies from ripping off Americans through the Fair Price Negotiation Program which will bring fairer, more affordable prescription drugs to American patients.

People are forced to decide between paying for life-saving meds or putting food on the table. This cannot remain a reality for Americans. #HR3 will save lives by making prescription drugs more affordable.
